resources.string: Light and fun questions to warm up
More personal questions to get to know each other
Intimate questions for couples ready to go deeper
Share your thoughts and feelings about this question
Tap or swipe to reveal answer side
Tap or swipe to go back
Time to put down your phone and learn about who you spend 99% of your time with.
Divide the cards into the 3 designated piles: "Ice Breaker," "Deep," and "Deeper."
Players alternate turns reading and answering the questions, starting with the Ice Breaker Card and then working their way on to the 2 Deep and then 2 Deeper Cards.
Play until you know too much about each other... or it\'s time to take it to the bedroom.
FROM THE CREATORS OF\nWHAT DO YOU MEME?
